ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of CLAUDE FRANK LLOYD of Ashton, Ontario, as a director of the board of directors of Defence Construction (1951) Limited, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
